widget.name: Ask me anything meaningful
widget.description: At the end of the 19th century it was a popular game on social events to answer a questionnaire. They should help to learn about the interviewee and their character. The french author Marcel Proust (1871-1922) was one of the most famous people who answered it. This applications, Ask Me Anything Meaningful (AMAM), presents a randomized question from these questionnaire so you can discuss it with another person.
widget.author: Lukas Subel
